speaker: Narrator
line: Rocks and shards of ice rained down. Slaves panicked, tangled in chains, screams filling the night.

speaker: Older Soldier
line: On your feet, fools! Get to the wall!

speaker: Narrator
line: A massive lump fell between caravan and wall, then rose — a towering monstrosity with fur like dirty snow, bone claws, and five milky eyes.

speaker: Sunny
line: That thing must be at least four meters tall.

speaker: Sunny
line: Well, that is just… too much.

speaker: Narrator
line: The monster slashed. Sunny leapt aside, dragging the broad-shouldered slave into its path.

speaker: Sunny
line: Damn! Why are you so heavy!

speaker: Narrator
line: Blood drenched him. A chilling howl shook the platform.

speaker: Narrator
line: The broad-shouldered corpse convulsed — bone spikes tearing skin, mouth splitting into rows of needle fangs.

speaker: Sunny
line: What are you staring at?! Move away from it!

speaker: Narrator
line: Sunny realized: this was no beast. It was a tyrant, creating a spawn of itself — far beyond a First Nightmare’s rules.

speaker: Narrator
line: Sunny acted. He looped the chain around the monster’s shoulders, pulling to bind its arms.

speaker: Sunny
line: You two! Pull on that chain as though your lives depend on it!

speaker: Narrator
line: The shifty slave and scholar pulled hard, tightening the chain as the monster strained.

speaker: Narrator
line: Sunny wrapped the shackle chain around its neck, pulling with his whole body, back arched against it.

speaker: Narrator
line: Sweat and blood covered him. Every muscle screamed. Finally, the monster went limp.

speaker: Nightmare Spell System
line: [You have slain a dormant beast, Mountain King's Larva.]
